scripts.version: echo $npm_package_version && yarn workspaces foreach -Atv version $npm_package_version && yarn workspaces foreach -Atv version $npm_package_version && yarn version:optional-deps && yarn && git add packages/*/package.json && yarn version:yarn-lock && yarn version:cargo
scripts.version:cargo: perl -i -pe 's/^version = "[^"]+"/version = "'$npm_package_version'"/' Cargo.toml && cargo check && git add Cargo.*
